amendment.description: To provide taxpayers with an annual report disclosing the cost of, performance by, and areas for improvements for Government programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 794 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 794 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6808-6809; text: CR S6808-6809) To provide taxpayers with an annual report disclosing the cost of, performance by, and areas for improvements for Government programs, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 794 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
